article_title: Racial discrimination could exacerbate COVID-19 for African Nova Scotians: advocates
article_description: Lack of specific health data and misinformation could exacerbate racial discrimination and disproportionately affect African Nova Scotians during the COVID 19 pandemic  advocates say
